snap(-30,-45,10)

sky(0,0,0)
fog(0,0,0)
ground(100,100,100)
polys(125,125,125)

fadefrom(7000)
density(4)
lightson(6)

name(Million Dollar Run)
nlaps(2)

set(47,0,0,0)p
set(10,0,5600,0)po
set(10,0,11200,0)p
set(26,0,11200,0)pr
set(10,0,16800,0)p
set(10,0,22400,0)p
set(10,0,28000,0)p
set(22,0,31300,0)p
set(10,0,34700,180)p
set(31,0,40800,0)pr
set(23,0,42500,180)p
set(23,0,47600,0)p
set(10,0,50400,180)p
set(10,0,56000,180)p
set(10,0,61600,180)p
set(10,0,67200,180)p
chk(40,0,69200,0)
set(14,0,71700,0)pt
set(10,4500,71700,90)p
set(13,10100,73200,-60)p
chk(40,13500,74700,90)
set(22,13500,74700,90)
set(14,15800,74700,-90)pt
set(10,15800,70200,0)p
chk(40,15800,67400,0)

/// road 1

set(13,17300,64600,-150)p
set(10,18800,59000,0)p
chk(40,18800,56200,180)
set(10,18800,53400,0)p
set(31,18800,50600,180)pr
set(10,18800,47800,0)p

set(14,18800,-7100,90)pt
chk(40,23300,-7100,90)p
set(10,23300,-7100,90)p
set(12,28900,-8600,60)p

set(10,34500,-10100,90)p

/// road 2

set(10,15800,64600,0)p
set(10,15800,59000,0)p

set(10,33600,33900,0)p

set(10,33600,39500,0)p
set(10,33600,45100,0)p
set(10,33600,50600,0)p
set(31,33600,53400,0)pr
fix(41,33600,75900,-500,0)s
set(36,33600,75900,0)ph
chk(40,33600,75900,0)

/// road 3

set(12,14300,64600,150)p

chk(40,9000,-5600,180)
set(10,9000,-5600,0)p
set(14,9000,-10100,180)pt
set(10,4500,-10100,90)p
set(32,3000,-10400,90)pr
set(32,3000,-9800,90)pr
chk(40,1500,-10100,-90)
set(14,0,-10100,90)pt
set(10,0,-5600,0)p


maxl(20,-8900,-11500)
maxt(12,82100,-6500)
maxr(20,48700,-11500)
maxb(12,-13900,-6500)
